title: README CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH trick, from Dockerfile
body_html: If you're installing from source in a conda env that's not root, this saves time. Just copied from the Dockerfile already in the repo. Not really necessary if you have any idea how the compilation or conda actually works, but if you're lazy and you just want to copy-paste things from install instructions, this helps.
